Posts.Content: HFArizona wrote: I have had a recurrence of cancer on the left after a 1995 mastectomy with negative nodes (HER-2 positive). I have a new cancer on the right T1c,N1 mastectomy 2011 with 1 negative node 8 benign. Radiaiton Oncology is now saying I still need Radtion on the right side in addition to the left. Has any one ever faced this? Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Nov 14, 2011 11:59AM HFArizona wrote: Am curious as to what you decided as I too am facing a similar situation. I suggest you read a Clinical Investigation called " Prognostic Index Score and Clinical Prediction Model of Local Regional Recurrence After Mastectomy in Breast Cancer" . I have had a double mastectomy, and have to have radiation on the left side due to possible mamory node invation, but choose not to have radiation on the right side.
